What are you guys doing?"},{"lineNumber":13026,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もう仕事終わりか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Already done with work?\""},{"lineNumber":13027,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くるしゅーないのれすー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No need to be formal~\""},{"lineNumber":13028,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、これは総統閣下……と、お付きの方。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, this is the Supreme Commander... and your attendant."},{"lineNumber":13029,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いえ、雷軍は普段からこのようなもので……","translatedEnglishLine":"No, the Thunder Army is usually like this..."},{"lineNumber":13030,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その分、朝は早いです」","translatedEnglishLine":"But conversely, our mornings start early.\""},{"lineNumber":13031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カミナリ爺の生活に合わせてんのか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You adjust to the old Thunder man's lifestyle, huh."},{"lineNumber":13032,"originalJapaneseLine":"　親玉が年寄りだと面倒だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Having an old boss is troublesome.\""},{"lineNumber":13033,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、違います。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, that's not it."},{"lineNumber":13034,"originalJapaneseLine":"　雷帝様は魔法研究をされているので……","translatedEnglishLine":"The Thunder Emperor is researching magic..."},{"lineNumber":13035,"originalJapaneseLine":"　合わせているとしたらそちらにです」","translatedEnglishLine":"If we're adjusting to anything, it's to that.\""},{"lineNumber":13036,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほーう……？　面白いのか？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh...? Is it interesting?"},{"lineNumber":13037,"originalJapaneseLine":"　詳しく聞かせろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Tell me more.\""},{"lineNumber":13038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sigh...\""},{"lineNumber":13039,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ジジイ！　おーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Old man! Hey!\""},{"lineNumber":13040,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん……小僧か」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm... a brat.\""},{"lineNumber":13041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前、なんか面白いモノ飼ってるらしいな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I heard from the subordinates you keep something interesting."},{"lineNumber":13042,"originalJapaneseLine":"　部下から聞いたぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard it from the troops.\""},{"lineNumber":13043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ご主人様、飼ってるんじゃなくて……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Master doesn't keep it like a pet..."},{"lineNumber":13044,"originalJapaneseLine":"………………生やしてる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...he's growing it?\""},{"lineNumber":13045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どちらも違う。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Neither is correct."},{"lineNumber":13046,"originalJapaneseLine":"　言うなれば、生み出している最中だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"You could say he is in the process of creating it.\""},{"lineNumber":13047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どんなものだ。一度――――","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What sort of thing is it? Just once—"},{"lineNumber":13048,"originalJapaneseLine":"見せん。帰れ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I won't show you. Go away.\""},{"lineNumber":13049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がーーー！　先読みするんじゃない！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahhh! Don't read ahead like that!"},{"lineNumber":13050,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ケチケチするな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't be so stingy.\""},{"lineNumber":13051,"originalJapaneseLine":"「繊細なものだ。荒らされたら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's something delicate. If it's disturbed..."},{"lineNumber":13052,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっはーん、困るのか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ha ha— so it becomes a problem."},{"lineNumber":13053,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ならお前がいない間に荒らしまくってくれるわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then I'll wreck it all while you're not around.\""},{"lineNumber":13054,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我を失って、所構わず雷を降らせるかもしれんな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It might lose control and rain thunder everywhere.\""},{"lineNumber":13055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……迷惑なじじいめ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...What a troublesome old man...\""},{"lineNumber":13056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前に言われたくはないな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't want to be told that by you.\""},{"lineNumber":13057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが世話の時間は厳守すると聞いた！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But I heard the care times are strictly observed!"},{"lineNumber":13058,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここでこうして邪魔していれば……」","translatedEnglishLine":"If I keep bothering you here like this...\""},{"lineNumber":13059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「雷撃」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lightning strike!\""},{"lineNumber":13060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんぎゃーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aaughhh!\""},{"lineNumber":13061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seriously...\""},{"lineNumber":13062,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くそっ、あてな！　ゴーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn it, Atena! Go!\""},{"lineNumber":13063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「てやー！　へいへい、ぶろーっく！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Take this! Hey hey, block!\""},{"lineNumber":13064,"originalJapaneseLine":"………………","translatedEnglishLine":"................"},{"lineNumber":13065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何を隠そう、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To tell the truth,"},{"lineNumber":13066,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あてなは雷で普通に丸焦げになるれすよ？","translatedEnglishLine":"Atena normally gets completely burned by lightning, you know?"},{"lineNumber":13067,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でぃーふぇんす、でぃーふぇんす！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Defense, defense!\""},{"lineNumber":13068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ふぅ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Phew.\""},{"lineNumber":13069,"originalJapaneseLine":"カバッハーンは、疲労の色濃く、溜息を吐いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kabahaan sighed deeply, his fatigue clearly visible."},{"lineNumber":13070,"originalJapaneseLine":"「悪ガキどもめ。仕方のない」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You little brats. Can't be helped.\""},{"lineNumber":13071,"originalJapaneseLine":"阻むあてなをするりと避けて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Slipping past the obstructing Atena,"},{"lineNumber":13072,"originalJapaneseLine":"カバッハーンは自室へと歩いていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kabahaan walked back to his room."},{"lineNumber":13073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「およ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":13074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「来るならさっさとしろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you're coming, hurry up.\""},{"lineNumber":13075,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がはははは、最初っからそう言えばいいのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, you should have said that from the start."},{"lineNumber":13076,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もったいつけやがって」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't beat around the bush.\""},{"lineNumber":13077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……後悔するなよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Don't say I didn't warn you.\""},{"lineNumber":13078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どぅぉあーーーーッ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Duoaaahhh!?\""},{"lineNumber":13079,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの頭上を、脇を、顔の傍を、閃光が奔る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Flashes of light raced over Rance's head, side, and beside his face."},{"lineNumber":13080,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、な、なんじゃこの部屋はーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what is this roomーー!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小隊長は明日改めて、作戦会議を行う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The squad leader will hold a strategy meeting again tomorrow."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、これは総統閣下……と、お付きの方。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, this is the Supreme Commander... and your attendant.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、雷軍は普段からこのようなもので……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, the Thunder Army is usually like this...
But conversely, our mornings start early."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カミナリ爺の生活に合わせてんのか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You adjust to the old Thunder man's lifestyle, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親玉が年寄りだと面倒だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Having an old boss is troublesome."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雷帝様は魔法研究をされているので……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Thunder Emperor is researching magic...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 合わせているとしたらそちらにです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we're adjusting to anything, it's to that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前、なんか面白いモノ飼ってるらしいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I heard from the subordinates you keep something interesting.
I heard it from the troops."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご主人様、飼ってるんじゃなくて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Master doesn't keep it like a pet...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言うなれば、生み出している最中だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could say he is in the process of creating it."
"What sort of thing is it? Just once—
I won't show you. Go away."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーー！　先読みするんじゃない！
「繊細なものだ。荒らされたら……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha ha— so it becomes a problem.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ならお前がいない間に荒らしまくってくれるわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then I'll wreck it all while you're not around."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我を失って、所構わず雷を降らせるかもしれんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It might lose control and rain thunder everywhere."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前に言われたくはないな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't want to be told that by you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが世話の時間は厳守すると聞いた！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But I heard the care times are strictly observed!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでこうして邪魔していれば……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I keep bothering you here like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「てやー！　へいへい、ぶろーっく！」
あてなは雷で普通に丸焦げになるれすよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Atena normally gets completely burned by lightning, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: でぃーふぇんす、でぃーふぇんす！」
カバッハーンは、疲労の色濃く、溜息を吐いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kabahaan sighed deeply, his fatigue clearly visible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 阻むあてなをするりと避けて、
カバッハーンは自室へと歩いていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kabahaan walked back to his room.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははは、最初っからそう言えばいいのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, you should have said that from the start.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もったいつけやがって」
ランスの頭上を、脇を、顔の傍を、閃光が奔る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flashes of light raced over Rance's head, side, and beside his face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、な、なんじゃこの部屋はーー！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
